sentence.Network_cn: 研究生学历是从事教学工作的最低要求。

entry.def: A requirement is a quality or qualification that you must have in order to be allowed to do something or to be suitable for something.

example.ex: Its products met all legal requirements...
example.tran: 它的产品符合所有的法律要求。

example.ex: Graduate status is the minimum requirement for entry to the teaching profession...
example.tran: 研究生学历是从事教学工作的最低要求。

entry.def: Your requirements are the things that you need.

example.ex: Variations of this programme can be arranged to suit your requirements.
example.tran: 本方案可以进行调整，以满足您的需求。

example.ex: ...a packaged food which provides 100 percent of your daily requirement of one vitamin.
example.tran: 能够百分之百满足人体对于一种维生素每日所需的包装食品

sentences.sentence: "the requirements of his work affected his health"
"there were many demands on his time"
"food and shelter are necessities of life"
"allow farmers to buy their requirements under favorable conditions"
"a place where the requisites of water fuel and fodder can be obtained"

stems_affixes.word_buile: acquire获得;学到+ed……的→adj.后天习得的
acquire获得;学到+ment表名词→n.取得,习得;成就,造诣
en进入……之中+quir寻求,询问+y状态→n.询问

stems_affixes.value_cn: 需求, 要求, 必要条件, 需要的东西
stems_affixes.word_buile: require[v.需要;[of]要求,命令]+ment表名词→n.需求, 要求, 必要条件, 需要的东西

stems_affixes.value_cn: 获得;学到[知识等];养成[习惯]
stems_affixes.word_buile: ac加强动作+quir寻求,询问+e→寻求得到,获取
en进入……之中+quir寻求,询问+e→进入询问之中→询问
in进入+quir寻求,询问+e→问进去→盘问
re再+quir寻求,询问+e→再寻求→请求

Sentence.sentence: To meet the requirements of her in-service training.
That was the first mode for a black box, which became a requirement on all U.S. commercial flights by 1960.
The rigorous requirements placed on the writing of poetry stimulate the poet's creativity.
It is closely linked to future career requirements
In some cases the quality requirements are so exacting that even if you wanted to have a human do the job, you couldn't.

means.word_mean: 要求, 要求条件, 必要条件

sentences.en: Your requirement that she wait till next week is reasonable.
sentences.cn: 你要求她等到下周是有道理的。

jushi.english: This shop can supply all your requirements.
jushi.chinese: 这家商店能供应所有你需要的物品。

jushi.english: His sole requirement is that the machine run normally.
jushi.chinese: 他的唯一要求就是这台机器能正常运作。
